categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Lodani was a female Human sergeant of the reconstituted Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY she was stationed on the Harrower-class dreadnought White Nova during the Battle of the Foundry.
Sergeant Lodani appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic as an NPC on the White Nova, who begins the flashpoint "The Foundry."
